alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 11:37AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis and northeastern Carlton Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1137 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hermantown, or 8 miles northeast of Cloquet, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hermantown and Pike Lake Near Duluth around 1145 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
